duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate program planning and strategic initiative identification with Executive Leadership from Client Global Network Pillar.
Collaborate with stakeholders, governance representatives, and Business Architects to deliver feasibility analyses.
Ensure regular stakeholder reviews, accountability, and monitoring are in place.
Provide status of program and project efforts, drive communication with project managers and product owners.
Develop and manage the program to deliver defined benefits and critical success factors.
Participate in coaching, mentoring, and onboarding activities within the Network PMO and other divisions/business units.
Actively learn about the business to be better prepared for future assignments, build strong relationships through networking for personal growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Project Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
